entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy. Blowing snow at times this morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:24 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
